commands.speaker: You
commands.line: One, two, three, four... Good stretch!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hanamaru and the others are late. I wonder what happened.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Oh my... I guess I'll go see.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: S-Sorry we're late, zura!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Sorry!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You are very late! Our dance lesson was set for two in the afternoon on the roof today.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: S-Sorry...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We got caught up writing the script for the tourist info piece, and when we noticed it was already so late.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I know everyone is busy every day with preparations but keeping to a schedule is the basis of everyday life. You're not only inconveniencing yourself if you don't.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Now, now. That's enough, Dia. Ruby and Hanamaru, stretch please. I'm sure you're warmed up, but just in case.

commands.speaker: Ruby, Hanamaru
commands.line: Okay.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (*Sigh* Late this morning, late again now.)

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Are you okay? You're totally out of breath.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Chika! Oh, I'm okay. Sorry about this morning! I know you waited for me that whole time.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Don't sweat it. Sorry I left without you. You didn't get lost at school, did you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Chuckle* Great. I was a little worried.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Do you think I can watch you guys practice?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Sure! Actually, why don't you join us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What? I couldn't do that. I'll just be watching quietly in the corner.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Okay everyone! Let's check our dance formation. Everyone in position!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Okay, that's enough. Let's take ten.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Whew, I'm beat.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good work everyone! Here are some towels and drinks!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Thanks. Ahhh, this towel is so nice and soft!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Thank you. It seems like you're turning into our servant or something.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't worry about it. I just want to do what I can to help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Seeing Aqours' dancing up close makes me realize just how high level it is.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (They haven't even perfected it yet and it's this good. I wonder how much they've practiced.)

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Our timing at the start is improving but our timing at the end is off more than before.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Dia is writing something in her notebook.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Umm... May I ask what you're up to, Dia?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You don't need to be so formal with me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Oh, okay! I just feel like I need to behave more properly when I talk to you for some reason.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Do I seem that uptight? I was a little harsh when you were late, though. *Sigh*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't feel bad about it! You were a bit scary, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But groups need someone to tell them like it is, just like you do!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Thank you. That makes me feel better.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What's that notebook by the way? You were writing in it just now.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It's a record of our lessons. Would you like to see?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Can I? That'd be great.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa! Everything about that day's lesson, everyone's condition, and even the festival prep work is outlined in this.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's so detailed!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Keeping a log allows us to assess the time we need to create each part of our performance. We also have an estimate of our capabilities and our next schedule.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I have everyone take care of their own health, but sometimes other people notice what you don't. One can't be too careful.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's amazing. I do something similar for our club, but it's more like a diary. Like we did this on this day and blah blah.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I need to start recording things in more detail for everyone's sake.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Have you...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Have you never considered standing on the stage?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Me? On stage?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Please don't get the wrong idea. I'm not doubting how much you want to support your friends.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I just thought that being involved in the school idol world, you'd want to bathe in the limelight a little.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm... Strangely I don't feel that way.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Is that so?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. It's not like I hate being on stage though. I just want to be their biggest supporter.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want to be the one who understands them the most.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think it's a lot more luxurious to do that than to try to make it as a school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's why I'm fine not going on stage. Instead, I want to watch everyone from closer than anyone else can be.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I see. Nijigasaki is lucky to have someone like you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* So much happened today.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yoshiko and You's cooking, Ruby and Hanamaru's tourist guide...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The prep for the festival is progressing well. They're almost done with the dance, too. I can't wait to see their show.)

commands.speaker: Announcer
commands.line: And now for the weather. A typhoon has developed in the ocean south of Japan.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Oh no, a typhoon. The projected course doesn't look like it'll hit us though.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I hope the skies will be clear on the day of the festival.)
